Controller

Class FirstLevelDivisionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.FirstLevelDivisionController

  • public class FirstLevelDivisionController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to control the first_level_divisions table in the database It has methods to add, remove, update, and load divisions from the database It also has a method to check if a division is available in the database If it is not available, it will add it to the database It also has a method to add a division to the database

      This method is called when a new instance of this class is created
